page.title: 13A DAY IN MY LIFE-ETTON 2
page.content: (CONT.P.12) We spent lots of money! When we returned home I played on the computer with Duncan,my friend Sophie and her brother Tim.At 11.40 my dad drove me to Beverley for riding at Bleach Yard stables.We rode on the Westwood.My pony was a small dun called Pickles.At 1.00 p.m. dad picked me up and we went to Beverley market and bought some grapes,then returned the library books.At home after a cheese and lettuce sandwich I called for Sophie.There was to be a barbecue party later at my house so we cycled to Cherry and bought marshmallows to toast.At 5.00 the Marshals and Whites( our friends) arrived.We had a smashing time playing French Cricket and stuffing ourselves with chicken, sausages beefburgers and kebabs.At 9.00 we all went inside to watch the 'Live Aid' concert on television.
